ValidationRule.description: This will prevent an Originations user from updating the Stage of a Deal to Withdrawn or Rejected once the Deal is in Underwriting
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), NOT(ISBLANK(Date_Stage_Changed_To_UW__c)), OR( $Profile.Name = "Relationship Manager", $Profile.Name = "Origination Manager", $Profile.Name = "Sales Analyst", $Profile.Name = "Sales Analyst Bridge Operations Hybrid", $Profile.Name = "Sales Analyst Term Operations Hybrid" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Once a Deal is in Underwriting, only the Operations team can update the Stage of the Deal
